name: Tackle
description: Tackle is one of the most common and basic moves a Pok√©mon learns. It deals damage with no additional effects.

name: Cut
description: A basic HM move that can be used to cut down small trees.

name: Surf
description: Ride a huge wave to strike all targets. Can cross water.

name: Fly
description: Soar up and strike on the next turn. Also travels between towns.

name: Ice Beam
description: Blasts a freezing beam that may freeze the target.

name: Thunderbolt
description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target.
